bilingual.source: The unofficial results were announced before the official ones.
bilingual.target: 非官方的结果在官方结果之前公布了。

bilingual.source: The official pronouncement was broadcasted on national television.
bilingual.target: 官方的声明在国家电视台上播出了。

bilingual.source: This is an unofficial version and may differ from the official one.
bilingual.target: 这是一个非官方的版本，可能与正式版本不同。

bilingual.source: Favoritism in official access can fan public perceptions of corruption.
bilingual.target: 官方的偏袒会激起公众对腐败的认知。

bilingual.source: In addition, information you get from newspapers is usually official and true.
bilingual.target: 此外，你从报纸上获得的信息通常是官方的和真实的。

bilingual.source: The official government Dietary Guidelines are based on reviews of hundreds of studies.
bilingual.target: 官方的政府膳食指南是基于对数百项研究的回顾。

bilingual.source: Official retrospections continue as to why London 2012 failed to "inspire a generation."
bilingual.target: 对于2012年伦敦奥运会为何没能"激励一代人"，官方的回顾仍在继续。

bilingual.source: This is the official kind of strike.

bilingual.target: 官方的统计数字却有点不容乐观.

bilingual.source: I happen to have the official statistics with me.
bilingual.target: 我碰巧身边有官方的统计数字.

list.abstract: official（英[əˈfɪʃl]，美[əˈfɪʃl]），英语单词，作形容词用，为官方的；来自官方的；获准的。作名词用，为官员；主持法官。短语搭配有official act（官方行为），例句为“Get your official Junior Ranger Badge.（获得正式的少年骑警徽章）”。 official形容词类近义词有formal、state，名词类近义词有nazir、office holder，反义词有unofficial，副词形式为officially、officiously。

乐曲内容
Ooh baby If only you Only you knew You make me
Run to you Run to you Baby 첨엔 망설였지만 一开始虽然犹豫过 좀 겁났었지만 虽然有些害怕 속으론 오늘밤을 기다려왔어 但心底一直期待着今夜的到来 온종일 그 생각에 一整天一直 계속 상상하게 돼 沉浸在想象中 밤새 둘이서 一整晚我们俩 All the things that we'll do 너에게 안길 때 被你拥抱的时候 키스할 때 亲吻的时候 네 옆에 잠들 때 在你身边入睡的时候 눈을 뜰 때 睁开眼的时候 My heart My soul My body 이 순간부터 baby 24/7 从此刻开始 宝贝 每天每夜 I wanna be your girl 내가 니꺼란 걸 我想让你感受到 느끼게 해주고 싶어 我是你的 I wanna be official 네가 원한다면 如果你想要 그게 무엇이든 不管是什么 너에게 다 주고 싶어 我都想给你 I wanna be official I wanna be yours 애매한 건 싫어 got to be official 不想暧昧不清 我要正式成为你的 Don't know why Why we waited so long 더 이상은 참을 수 없는 걸 再也无法忍着 너에게 안길 때 被你拥抱的时候 Ooh 너와 키스 할 때 I get high 和你亲吻的时候 I get high My heart My soul My body 이 순간부터 baby 24 7 从此刻开始 宝贝 每天每夜 I wanna be your girl 내가 니꺼란 걸 我想让你感受到 느끼게 해주고 싶어 我是你的 I wanna be official 네가 원한다면 如果你想要 그게 무엇이든 不管是什么 너에게 다 주고 싶어 我都想给你 I wanna be official 난 눈이 꽤 높아서 我的眼光挺高的 널 딱 보자마자 바로 정했어 所以看到你的那瞬间已经确定了 내 밤은 널 위해서만 써 이제는 现在我的夜晚只愿和你度过 삐쩍 마른 걔넨 자극이 안돼 내겐 干瘦的她们无法刺激我 이유는 네가 잘 알면서 자꾸 왜 이래 你知道理由为什么还这样 근거 없는 자신감이 아냐 bae bae 这不是没有由来的自信感 宝贝 겪어보면 이해하게 돼 经历了就能理解了 I told you 기억해 봐 전부터 얘기했던 걸 想想吧 之前我说的 요즘 쇼핑할 땐 관심 없던 最近逛街都开始注意 여자 옷도 보여 以前不在意的女生衣服 너로 가득 차 있는 건 被你占据的 내 머릿속뿐만이 아닌 걸 不仅是我的脑海 물론 지금도 다 좋지만 当然现在也很好 한번 터트리고 싶어 但是想爆发一次 I wanna be official Hey 사람들은 날 걱정하는데 大家担心着我 Boy I just can't get you outta my head The only one for me is you Is you Is you baby I wanna be your girl 내가 니꺼란 걸 我想让你感受到 느끼게 해주고 싶어 我是你的 I wanna be official 네가 원한다면 如果你想要 그게 무엇이든 不管是什么 너에게 다 주고 싶어 我都想给你 I wanna be official Be official Be official

yingyinNormal.en: I once gave myself an official reprimand for conducting a meeting in the shower. The steam warped my gavel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我曾经就自己边洗澡边开会给了自己一个官方的谴责。蒸汽把我的木槌弄弯了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's official. You're all free.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这次是正式的，你们都自由了。

yingyinNormal.en: So I guess we should make it official, huh?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我想我们应该要正式点，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: All aboard! It's official. I'm an H-O trainiac.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全员上车！我正式宣布！我现在是HO火车爱好者了。

yingyinNormal.en: You are the official baby-crier stopper. Yes, I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是官方认可的婴儿止哭专家。是啊，我正是。

yingyinNormal.en: And, you are now sitting in the official breastfeeding area.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且呢，你们现在坐的地方正是特选"哺乳区"。

yingyinNormal.en: And as we discussed, the official school policy is abstinence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正像我们讨论过的，学校的规定是节欲。

yingyinNormal.en: How do I find him? The official answer is: you don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要怎样才能找到他？官方回答是，不要去找他。

yingyinNormal.en: This is an official question. Mexico City. What were you doing there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 请正式回答这个问题，你去墨西哥城干什么？

yingyinNormal.en: That is now the official version, the version anyone we want to will see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是官方版本了，其他人所看到的就会是这个版本。

yingyinNormal.en: I think that we can find someone not so official to help with that. He offered.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想这点小事不必劳人大驾吧。他说找他的。

yingyinNormal.en: Not an official one, no, but I thought maybe we could bring him on as a consultant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有正式理由，但我想或许我们可以给他个顾问之名。

yingyinNormal.en: This one too. Former Mossad. Let me guess. Presumed dead. Tonight, I made it official.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个也是。前以色列摩萨德特工。让我猜猜，推测已死亡。今晚，我已经亲手把它变成了事实。

yingyinNormal.en: But until then, my official answer to you is stand down. Now you know I can't do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是在那之前，我给你的官方回答是什么都不要做。你知道我做不到的。

yingyinNormal.en: Was there anything unusual about how you found her? To warrant an official investigation?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们在她身上发现了什么特别之处么？以至于要让警方开始调查？

yingyinNormal.en: Buckingham Palace, perhaps the most famous palace in the world, is the official residence of Queen Elizabeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 白金汉宫可能是全世界最著名的宫殿，它是伊利沙伯女皇的官方居所。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the official school position is that we prepare you for safe sex now. So please take one and pass it down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，学校的政策是帮助你们进行安全性行为，所以每人拿一个，往后传。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. You know, I have always been intrigued by flip-flops. The official footwear of the laid-back fellow. Okay, sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我倒是一直对人字拖感到好奇。悠闲之人的标配鞋。你高兴就好。

yingyinNormal.en: Speaking with local official, this reporter has learned, in fact, only one shrimping boat actually survived the storm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 和官方人员谈过之后，记者被告知实际上只有一条捕虾船幸免于难。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting. If my official residence were across the hall, I wonder if I'd need to knock every time I came over here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有意思。如果我把寝宫移到了对门，那我回来这里需不需要敲门呢？

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公职人员；公务人员；公务员

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 军官；船长；高级船员；政府官员；担任公职者；基督教教会执事；某一荣誉等级中的一分子；警官；法警
adj. 非官方的；非正式的
adv. 正式地；官方地；据官方公开消息
adj. 官方的；来自官方的；获准的；官气十足的；被授权的；源自官方的；经正式授权的；官僚的

word_family.mean: n. 办公室；官职；公职；好事；每日的祈祷；任务；作用；祈祷；储藏室；办事处

sense_info_list.en: a person who is in a position of authority in a large organization

examination_example.sentence: The basic compact underlying representative government assumes that public <highlight>officials</highlight> will hear from their constituents and act on their concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 代议制政府的基本契约假定公职人员将听取选民的意见，并根据他们所关心的问题行事。

examination_example.sentence: The court's ruling is a step forward in the struggle against both corruption and <highlight>official</highlight> favoritism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法院的裁决是在反腐败和公务偏袒的斗争中向前迈进的一步。

examination_example.sentence: Rather <highlight>officials</highlight> must avoid double standards, or different types of access for average people and the wealthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，官员必须避免双重标准，或是区别对待普通人和富人。

sense_info_list.en: having the approval or authorization of an authority or public body

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Official</highlight> retrospections continue as to why London 2012 failed to "inspire a generation."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官方仍在反思为什么2012年伦敦奥运会未能“激励一代人”。

examination_example.sentence: Favoritism in <highlight>official</highlight> access can fan public perceptions of corruption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官方的偏袒会激起公众对腐败的认知。

examination_example.sentence: Simply arranging a meeting, making a phone call, or hosting an event is not an "<highlight>official</highlight> act."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅仅安排一次会面、打个电话、或者举办一次活动并不是“官方行为”。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表形容词, "...的", 一般缀于名词后

word_usage.usage: official作形容词时，一般只用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：official responsibilities

exam_freq_info.chinese: 官方授权的; 正式的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 军官；船长；高级船员；政府官员；担任公职者；基督教教会执事；某一荣誉等级中的一分子；警官；法警
adj. 非官方的；非正式的
adv. 正式地；官方地；据官方公开消息
adj. 官方的；来自官方的；获准的；官气十足的；被授权的；源自官方的；经正式授权的；官僚的

word_family.mean: n. 办公室；官职；公职；好事；每日的祈祷；任务；作用；祈祷；储藏室；办事处

examination_example.sentence: By coordinating across local, state, and even national borders, <highlight>officials</highlight> hope that the worst-case scenario can be averted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们希望可以通过跨地方、跨州、甚至跨国界的协调来避免最坏的情况。

examination_example.sentence: On the exercise's website, <highlight>officials</highlight> explain that the report they prepare during this rehearsal will inform disaster management for years to come.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在演习的网站上，官员们解释说，他们在这次演习中准备的报告可以为未来几年的灾难管理提供有用信息。

examination_example.sentence: The last time a major earthquake occurred along the Cascadia fault was in 1700, so <highlight>officials</highlight> worry that another event could occur any time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡斯卡迪亚断层上一次发生大地震是在1700年，因此官员们担心另一次地震随时可能发生。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Officials</highlight> at the White House announced a new space policy focused on managing the increasing number of satellites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白宫官员宣布了一项新的太空政策，着重于管理不断增加的卫星数量。

examination_example.sentence: This ban is being discussed and implemented is because energy <highlight>officials</highlight> see that they will not reach their emissions goals by 2050.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 讨论和实施这项禁令的原因是，能源官员预见他们将无法在2050年达到排放目标。

sense_info_list.en: having the approval or authorization of an authority or public body
sense_info_list.zh: 官方授权的; 正式的

examination_example.sentence: What's more, young people should also shoulder their responsibility and only forward <highlight>official</highlight> information released by the relevant departments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更何况，年轻人也要肩负起自己的责任，只转发有关部门发布的官方信息。

examination_example.sentence: The state will use it as <highlight>officials</highlight> deliberate the specifics of an outsourcing plan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 州政府将在官员审议外包计划的细节时使用它。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 办公室, 政府机关

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 军官；船长；高级船员；政府官员；担任公职者；基督教教会执事；某一荣誉等级中的一分子；警官；法警
adv. 正式地；官方地；据官方公开消息
adj. 官方的；来自官方的；获准的；官气十足的；被授权的；源自官方的；经正式授权的；官僚的

word_family.mean: n. 办公室；官职；公职；好事；每日的祈祷；任务；作用；祈祷；储藏室；办事处

examination_example.sentence: What do NASA <highlight>officials</highlight> think about the thick clouds?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国宇航局官员如何看待厚厚的云层？

examination_example.sentence: "I think we're unique as a federal agency," USPS <highlight>official</highlight> Mike Swig art told me, "be use we're in literally every community in this country.... We're obligated to deliver to that point on a daily basis."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政局官员迈克·斯威特跟我这么说：“我认为我们作为一个联邦机构是独一无二的，因为我们几乎忙活在国家的每一个社区里... 我们有义务每天都做到这一点。”

examination_example.sentence: With a growing body of evidence establishing a link between urban green spaces and a positive impact on human well-being, Dr. White said, "There's growing interest among public policy <highlight>officials</highlight>, but the trouble is who funds it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: White 博士说：“随着越来越多的证据表明城市绿地与人类福祉的积极影响有关，公共政策官员对此越来越感兴趣，但问题是谁为此提供资金。”

sense_info_list.en: having the approval or authorization of an authority or public body
sense_info_list.zh: 官方授权的; 正式的

examination_example.sentence: Simply put, countries stick to darker and more conservative colors because they appear more <highlight>official</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地说，国家坚持使用更暗、更保守的颜色，因为它们看起来更正式。

examination_example.sentence: There are no <highlight>official</highlight> rules regarding passport colors, but countries follow a certain set of norms when designing them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有关于护照颜色的官方规定，但是各国在设计护照颜色时遵循一定的规范。

examination_example.sentence: They look more <highlight>official</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们看起来更正式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 军官；船长；高级船员；政府官员；担任公职者；基督教教会执事；某一荣誉等级中的一分子；警官；法警
adv. 正式地；官方地；据官方公开消息
adj. 官方的；来自官方的；获准的；官气十足的；被授权的；源自官方的；经正式授权的；官僚的

word_family.mean: n. 办公室；官职；公职；好事；每日的祈祷；任务；作用；祈祷；储藏室；办事处

sense_info_list.en: having the approval or authorization of an authority or public body
sense_info_list.zh: 官方授权的; 正式的

examination_example.sentence: Which ranks them by their stated permanent capacity, as well as updated information from <highlight>official</highlight> stadium websites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该列表根据其声明的永久容量对它们进行排名，也依据了来自官方体育场网站的更新信息。

examination_example.sentence: In pre-Classical Greece, for instance, people "corrected" <highlight>official</highlight> calendars by shifting dates forward or backward to reflect the change of season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，在前古典时期的希腊，人们通过向前或向后移动日期来“修正”官方日历，以反映季节的变化。

examination_example.sentence: We'd love to explore Beale Street, the <highlight>official</highlight> home of the blues, where we'd listen to live music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们喜欢探索比尔街，那里是蓝调音乐的正式发源地，在那里我们可以听现场音乐。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Officials</highlight> at Port Lympne were delighted with the new arrival, as black rhinos are known for being difficult to breed in captivity (圈养).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莱姆普恩港的官员们对这头新犀牛的到来感到高兴，因为黑犀牛以其难以圈养繁殖而闻名。

examination_example.sentence: Last week some city <highlight>officials</highlight> suggested the city might be interested in turning the old theater into a museum and public meeting place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，一些市政官员表示，市政府可能有兴趣把这个旧剧院改造成博物馆和公众集会场所。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表形容词, "...的", 一般缀于名词后

exam_freq_info.chinese: 官方授权的; 正式的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 军官；船长；高级船员；政府官员；担任公职者；基督教教会执事；某一荣誉等级中的一分子；警官；法警
adv. 正式地；官方地；据官方公开消息
adj. 官方的；来自官方的；获准的；官气十足的；被授权的；源自官方的；经正式授权的；官僚的

word_family.mean: n. 办公室；官职；公职；好事；每日的祈祷；任务；作用；祈祷；储藏室；办事处

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 官方网站；官网；官方网址

examination_example.sentence: The government had news sheets sent to <highlight>officials</highlight> in the whole country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府向全国各地的官员发送了简报。

examination_example.sentence: American <highlight>officials</highlight> said Huawei gave information that it collected to the Chinese government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国官员表示，华为向中国政府提供了它收集到的信息。

examination_example.sentence: He cured the son of the Prince and was invited to be an <highlight>official</highlight> in that court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他治好了王子儿子的病，并被邀请到朝廷做官。

sense_info_list.en: having the approval or authorization of an authority or public body
sense_info_list.zh: 官方授权的; 正式的

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>official</highlight> language of China is Putonghua, while the foreigners usually call it Mandarin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国的官方语言是普通话，而外国人通常称之为普通话。

examination_example.sentence: It is the sponge's <highlight>official</highlight> name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是海绵的正式名称。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers suggested an <highlight>official</highlight> name for the sponge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员提出了海绵的正式名称。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 办公室, 政府机关
